episodes.title: Is MAGA a Cult? A World-Leading Expert Breaks It Down
episodes.description:
MAGA doesn’t behave like a political movement  it behaves like a cult. Blind loyalty, rejection of facts, and devotion to a single leader have replaced reality.

Dr. Steven Hassan, one of the world’s leading experts on cults and mind control and author of The Cult of Trump, explains how this happened  and whether millions can still be deprogrammed before the damage becomes permanent.

http://Thelefthook.substack.com

#CultOfTrump #MAGA #MindControl #StevenHassan #PoliticalCult #Deprogramming #Authoritarianism #Democracy #maga #news #ice #trending #breakingnews #trending
